comments:
The variables window does not display anything while debugging;
however, it seems to respond to mouseclicks in that the details pane
changes depending on where I click in the variables window.

In case it is relevant, here is some error I noticed in the log:

Closing unless there is a test case we can use. The stack dump (above) is 
unrelated - from the launch view attempting to render a transient thread that 
has since been garbage collected.
